content: pvz sunflower by shellowy ☆ basic info this is a pattern for a mini pvz sunflower doll which is 6 inches /15cm tall and 3 5 inches / 9cm wide ☆ disclaimer you can t share sell or claim this pattern as yours but you can obviously sell the dolls you make with it and make your own pattern with this as a base credit when making the doll is appreciated ☆ materials ● yellow yarn petals ● light brown yarn face ● dark brown yarn dirt ● brick colored yarn pot ● black yarn face details ● green yarn stem and leaves ● any kind of stuffing you prefer ● embroidery needle or any kind of thick needle which could help you sew/embroider on the mouth and eyes ● liquid silicone or any type of glue that can help you glue the leaves to the flower and the dirt to the pot ☆ optional ○ safety eyes nº8 or nº10 if you don t want to embroider them ☆ abbreviations ● magic_ring magic_ring ● r round ● slip_stitch slip-stitch ● single_crochet single_crochet ● increase increase ● decrease decrease ● half_double_crochet half_double_crochet ● double_crochet double_crochet ● swc switch color ● fo fasten_off ● blo back loops only ● flo front loops only ☆ important notes i use 4/7 sized yarn you can use other sizes of yarn though 1 ☆ head use brown colored yarn 1 8sc in magic_ring slip_stitch to 1st st of the round 8 2 ch1 8inc slip_stitch to 1st st 16 3 ch1 1sc 1inc x8 slip_stitch to 1st st 24 4 16 finish stuffing 10 1ch 8dec slip_stitch 8 f o leave a tail to close the hole ☆ stem use green yarn 1 8sc in magic_ring 8 2 8sc 8 a total of 7 rounds of full single_crochet 3 8sc 8 4 8sc 8 5 8sc 8 6
